author: brandonwilliams
msg: Point saved_caches in testing conf to build/test instead of /var/lib

author: gawor
msg: make things consistent with jcdi runner

author: gtully
msg: don't emit messages by default, only when explicitly configured as there are a dev debug aid, there are no simple handles exposed to effect the runtime values: https://issues.apache.org/activemq/browse/AMQ-2837

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #3726 ("svnserve lacks the equivalent of AuthzForceUsernameCase")
by introducing a new 'force-username-case' svnserve.conf option.
(create_conf): Add configuration defaults for a new 'force-username-case'
(load_configs): Add 'username_case' out parameter, and rewrite the
(main): Initialize 'username_case' baton member, and update call to
(authz_check_access): Calculate the authz_user, converting case as
necessary, and use that value for authz checks.

author: vanto
msg: Better fix for ODE-888, provides migration for running instances.
